channel.title: Ceno Browser Announcements
channel.description: RSS feed of announcements from the team behind Ceno Browser

item.title: Take a look at Ceno's two browsing modes: Public and Personal:
item.description: You can easily toggle between them. \nPublic mode offers the best connectivity but the least privacy - websites that you visit or share are recorded in a publicly-accessible registry (BitTorrent). \nPersonal mode eliminates this record but may be slower and less efficient at retrieving content. See the FAQ or User Manual for more details on Ceno usage.
